explanation: [0-0] A little girl in a red and black plaid dress is sitting on a stone wall in a park. She has braids, her hands are on her lap, her head is raised, and her eyes are looking into the distance. The background is a park-like outdoor area with trees, grass, and a few pedestrians.

[0-2] Suddenly, a young man in a red sweatshirt and gray jeans walks up to the girl from the right side of the screen, pats her on the shoulder with his right hand, and sits down beside her. He smiles and says something to her. The girl turns her head to look at the man and then turns back, pouting, crossing her arms over her chest, and squinting at the man. The man looks at the girl expectantly, then turns cold, folds his arms, and looks away.

The man looks at the girl expectantly, then turns cold, folds his arms, and looks away.

[2-9] Next, the girl looks down and pulls two phones out of her pocket. She puts one aside and fiddles with the other in her hand. The man immediately takes out a phone from his pocket. The girl suddenly looks up and puts the phone to her ear, pretending to talk on the phone. Seeing this, the man also takes out a phone from his pocket, puts it to his ear, and pretends to talk on the phone.

[9-12] Then, as they are talking, they suddenly become emotional and throw their phones to the ground. The man's phone falls to the ground and breaks in half. He is so scared that he quickly squats down to pick up his broken phone.

[12-15] Finally, the girl bends down to pick up her intact phone, stands beside the man, and triumphantly shows him her phone. The man holds his broken phone in his hand and looks at the girl and his broken phone with heartache and puzzlement, regretfully patting his head with his hand.
